misuses.description: The use of IDEA algorithm is not secure and should be avoided. It is a 64-bit block cipher that has been shown to be vulnerable to attacks. It is recommended to use a more secure algorithm such as AES.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure algorithm such as AES for encryption.

misuses.description: The use of CBC mode encryption with a 128-bit key is not secure and should be avoided. It is recommended to use a larger key size and a more secure mode of operation such as GCM or EAX.
misuses.recommendation: Use a larger key size and a more secure mode of operation such as GCM or EAX.
